title: Between the Scenes - Guest Edition: Kamala Harris Doesn't Focus on Demographics
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Guest Edition: Kamala Harris Doesn't Focus on Demographics
description:
Trevor talks with California Senator Kamala Harris about her respect for Tupac Shakur, finding commonalities among voters and her thoughts on immigration.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
